tool_description: Verify EAN, GTIN, UPC and ISBN barcodes and convert them into other formats
name: Barcode Verification and Conversion
title: Barcode Verification and Conversion

api_list.name: verify-upc-checksum
api_list.description: Verify the checksum inside a UPC barcode

api_list.name: upc-to-ean
api_list.description: Convert a UPC code into an EAN code

api_list.name: isbn-to-gtin
api_list.description: Convert an ISBN number (ISBN10) into a GTIN identifier (GTIN14)

api_list.name: gtin-to-ean
api_list.description: Convert a GTIN identifier into an EAN barcode (watch VALID flag in output if conversion is possible)

api_list.name: ean-to-gtin
api_list.description: Convert an EAN code into a GTIN identifier (GTIN14)

api_list.name: isbn-to-ean
api_list.description: Convert an ISBN number (ISBN10) into an EAN code

api_list.name: ean-to-isbn
api_list.description: Convert an EAN code into an ISBN number (ISBN10) (check the VALID flag in the output if conversion is possible)

api_list.name: ean-to-upc
api_list.description: Convert an EAN code into a UPC code (watch VALID flag in output if conversion is possible)

api_list.name: verify-ean-checksum
api_list.description: Verify the checksum inside an EAN barcode

api_list.name: verify-isbn-checksum
api_list.description: Verify the checksum inside an ISBN number
